org.firebirdsql.fbjava

Interface TriggerContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context

    public interface TriggerContext
extends Context
    This interface represents a Firebird Trigger Context.
    Author:
    Adriano dos Santos Fernandes

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static TriggerContext get()
        Gets the Context instance associated with the current call.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Context

      • getTableName

        String getTableName()
        Gets the table that fired the trigger. Returns null for database and DDL triggers.

      • getType

        TriggerContext.Type getType()
        Gets the type of the trigger.

      • getAction

        TriggerContext.Action getAction()
        Gets the action that fired the trigger.

      • getFieldsMetadata

        ValuesMetadata getFieldsMetadata()
        Gets the fields metadata. Returns null for database/ddl triggers.

      • getOldValues

        Values getOldValues()
        Gets the fields old values. Returns null for database/ddl and insert triggers.

      • getNewValues

        Values getNewValues()
        Gets the fields new values. Returns null for database/ddl and delete triggers.
